    "name": "Primes of the form p+(p+1)^3, where p is also prime.",
    "comment": [
        "Generated by p=2, 3, 17, 149, 191, 197, 227, 257 etc."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A165945/b165945.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Select[Table[p + (p + 1)^3, {p, Prime[Range[300]]}], PrimeQ] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 12 2012 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: p in PrimesInInterval(1, 1000) | IsPrime(a) where a is p + (p + 1)^3]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Ovt 12 2012"
    ],

        "Cf. A163426. [R. J. Mathar, Oct 28 2009]"
